footer.description: Professional horse care and transport. Over a decade of tradition in film production, events, and secure transport.

seo.default_title: Premium Riding School and Horse Care
seo.default_description: Horse Master offers premium horse riding lessons, professional care, and secure horse transport with a decade of tradition.
seo.keywords: horses, horse riding, riding school, equestrian club, horse transport, horse stable, Croatia

about.intro_main: HorseMaster has been dedicated to equine activities for over a decade.
about.intro_highlight: These noble animals are our passion and our calling.
about.intro_sub: We are here to adapt to all your needs and ideas. A large number of successfully realized projects and the trust of satisfied clients.
about.prod_desc: If you need horses for commercials, music videos, or movies — we are here for you. Our horses are trained for the set.
about.wedding_desc: Want indelible memories and a wedding photosession with horses? Unmatched elegance.
about.photo_desc: Whether it's private sessions or fashion editorials, we are here for you.
about.event_footer: We adapt to your specific needs.
